text: On 29 June 2020, the Balochistan Liberation Army (BLA) separatist militants attacked the Pakistan Stock Exchange (PSX) building in Karachi with grenades and by firing their guns. They killed three security guards and a police sub- inspector. They injured seven other people. Police reported that they killed all four attackers within 8 minutes by headshot. ==References== Stock Exchange attack Category:2020s in Sindh Category:June 2020 events Category:Karachi Category:Mass murder in 2020 Category:Mass murder in Asia Category:2020 mass shootings in Asia Category:Terrorist incidents in Asia in 2020 Category:Crime in Pakistan
title: Pakistan Stock Exchange attack
